name: Radish and Yogurt Chutney
description: This Radish and Yogurt Chutney from Anjum Anand's Anjum's New Indian takes all of the elements of a classic raita and adds shredded radishes in place of cucumber. The sauce has the same clean, cool flavor, but the radish adds a great pepperiness and lovely fuchsia tone. Adding a bit of chopped green chile is optional, but the spiciness compliments the cool radish raita beautifully.
recipeIngredient: 3 ounces red radishes, grated and squeezed to get rid of excess liquid

recipeInstructions.text: Simply mix all the ingredients together in a bowl, then chill until ready to serve.
